name: Mr Clarence T Mokoraki
profile: I am a person with a big heart for people, always ready to serve more than to be served. I follow the motto from Mark 10:35 "Whoever wants to be a leader among you must be your servant, 44 and whoever wants to be first among you must be the slave of everyone else." I am a father, a brother, a husband, and a son of God who is full of life and humility. I have vast knowledge in the IT field, especially customer service, which I live by the slogan "A customer belongs to all of us".
verse: Mark 10:35 Whoever wants to be a leader among you must be your servant, 44 and whoever wants to be first among you must be the slave of everyone else.
